verses.verse: Now when <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that her <S%H1121>son<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> she <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H6>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H4467>royal.<s%>

But <S%H3089>Jehosheba,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3141>Joram,<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> and <S%H1589>stole<s%> him away from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> who were <S%H4191>slain,<s%> even him and his <S%H3243>nurse,<s%> and put them in the <S%H2315>bedroom;<s%> and they <S%H5641>hid<s%> him <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H6271>Athaliah,<s%> so that he was not <S%H4191>slain;<s%>
He was with her <S%H2244>hidden<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over the <S%H776>land.<s%>

In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> the <S%H3746>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> of the <S%H3746>Carites<s%> and of the <S%H7323>guard,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to him into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H7650>them,<s%> and took an oath of them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son.<s%>

He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>do:<s%> a third <S%H7992>part<s%> of <S%H935>you,<s%> who come in on the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> shall be <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>watch<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house;<s%>

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> shall be at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H5495>Sur;<s%> and a third <S%H7992>part<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H7323>guard.<s%> So you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>watch<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and be a <S%H4535>barrier.<s%>

The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>companies<s%> of <S%H3318>you,<s%> even all who go out on the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>watch<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H413>around<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

You shall <S%H5362>surround<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he who <S%H935>comes<s%> within the <S%H7713>ranks,<s%> let him be <S%H4191>slain.<s%> Be with the <S%H4428>king<s%> when he goes <S%H3318>out,<s%> and when he comes <S%H935>in.<s%>"

The <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>commanded;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H582>men,<s%> those who were to come <S%H935>in<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> with those who were to go <S%H3318>out<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> the <S%H2595>spears<s%> and <S%H7982>shields<s%> that had been <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s, which were in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H7323>guard<s%> <S%H5975>stood,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> from the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> along by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then he brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5145>crown<s%> on <S%H5715>him,<s%> and gave him the testimony; and they made him <S%H4427>king,<s%> and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H5221>him;<s%> and they clapped their <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Long <S%H2421>live<s%> the <S%H4428>king!<s%>"

When <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H7323>guard<s%> and of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

and she <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H4428>behold,<s%> the king <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> as the tradition <S%H8269>was,<s%> and the captains and the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> by the <S%H4428>king;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8056>rejoiced,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets.<s%> Then <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H7167>tore<s%> her <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> <S%H7195>"Treason!<s%> <S%H7195>Treason!<s%>"

<S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> <S%H6485>who<s%> were set over the <S%H2428>army,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3318>them,<s%> "Bring her out <S%H1004>between<s%> the <S%H7713>ranks.<s%> <S%H4191>Kill<s%> him who <S%H935>follows<s%> her with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>" For the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4191>"Don't<s%> let her be slain in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

So they <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H3027>way<s%> for <S%H935>her;<s%> and she went by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5483>horses<s%>' <S%H3996>entry<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> She was slain <S%H4191>there.<s%>

<S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they should be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5971>people;<s%> between the <S%H4428>king<s%> also and the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and broke it <S%H5422>down;<s%> his <S%H4196>altars<s%> and his <S%H6754>images<s%> broke they in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> <S%H3190>thoroughly,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H4977>Mattan<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altars.<s%> The <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> <S%H6485>officers<s%> over the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3746>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and the <S%H3746>Carites,<s%> and the <S%H7323>guard,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> and they brought <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H7323>guard<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> He <S%H3427>sat<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings.<s%>

So all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H8252>quiet.<s%> <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> they had <S%H4191>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> at the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> was <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign.<s%>
